arts.ttl: USMNT gets thrashed by Switzerland as Pochettino continues free fall one year ahead of World Cup
arts.sum: T otal concern in the Pochettino era in the United States: The friendly against Switzerland seemed to be a scan of players, but the 4-0 defeat only shows the bad moment that the South American strategist is going through, who adds his fourth consecutive defeat. The United States will have as its last real test what will be the Gold Cup. If there are bad results, there is no doubt that the USMNT will look for a substitute to regulate the lost path in which they are clearly on.

arts.ttl: USMNT 0-4 Switzerland: Player Ratings From Uncompetitive Performance Before Gold Cup
arts.sum: Pochettino should have a good idea of what players he can trust this summer and who's wasted opportunities for minutes. Switzerland posed a different, yet just as difficult challenge as the Argentine looked to get his team ready for the Concacaf Gold Cup.

arts.ttl: Mauricio Pochettino Confirms USMNT Star to Miss Switzerland Friendly With Foot Injury
arts.sum: U.S. men's national team coach Mauricio Pochettino announced Tyler Adams won't play against Switzerland in international friendly action after picking up a foot injury against Türkiye. I think we can manage it in a good way and rest it for a few days, and then see if he can be ready for the Gold Cup. That is why he’s not going to be involved tomorrow,” Pochettino said in the buildup to the game.

arts.ttl: USA vs Switzerland - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Wednesday's International Friendlies clash between USA and Switzerland, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
